QAData.question: Who won between Manchester City and Leicester City on Sun, 26 Dec 2021 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Manchester City won 6–3 over Leicester City on Sun, 26 Dec 2021 15:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Kasper Schmeichel made an error that led to a goal for Manchester City.
Raheem Sterling was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.3.
Youri Tielemans committed a foul leading to a penalty for Manchester City.
Ruben Dias completed the most passes (124) in the match.
Kelechi Iheanacho has the least touches (21) of any outfield player.
Ademola Lookman won the most duels (9) in the match.
